question.text: Which of the following is incorrect about genetically modified crops?

options.text: GMO crops have increased the efficiency of mineral usage by plants.
Transgenic crops are more tolerant to abiotic stress.
GMO crops have reduced reliance on chemical pesticides.
Biofortified golden rice having high vitamin A content is an example of this.

solution.text: Breeding is a conventional technique used to improve traits in hybrid varieties. Several disease-resistant varieties, insect-resistant plants, plants resistant to environmental stress and biofortification are obtained through this. Biofortified golden rice having high vitamin A content is an example of this.
